charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking along a
mountain path one day and heard what sounded
like a woman singing.
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1101_0200:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] headed over to investigate the voice and
found Raihan and Flygon training together.
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_0300: Let the winds blow! Stream forward, Sandstorm!
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_0400:
Yo, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. So you’re here,
too, eh?
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_0301_0500: Huh? I thought I heard a woman...
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_0401_0600: A woman? What’re you on about?
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_0302_0700: I thought I heard someone singing...
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_0900: Oh, I see what happened now.
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_1000: I think you heard Flygon beating its wings.
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_1100:
People say that when Flygon whips up a
sandstorm by flapping its wings...
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_1200: it sounds like a woman singing.
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_1300: That’s why Flygon’s nickname is the Desert Spirit!
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_0401_1500: Haha! Hear that, mate? You’ve got yourself a fan!
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_0402_1700:
Haha! Bet you didn’t expect to hear something
like that, right?
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_1800: To me, Flygon and its Sandstorm move are special.
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_1900:
After all, Flygon was the reason I adopted a
battle style where we utilize weather effects to
their fullest!
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_2000:
Wanna hear more about our past? I’d be happy to
fill you in on the details, if you’re up for that.
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_0401_2200: OK! Then I’ll continue my story!
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_0402_2400: Guess I’ll have to finish my story!
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_2600:
I was looking for a way to win in any
environment and was thinking of utilizing
these weather effects, right?
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_2700: The first thing that came to mind was this Flygon.
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_2800:
I was always impressed by how Flygon used
Sandstorm to challenge his opponents, even if
he was outmatched!
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_2900:
That really resonated with me since I’m trying to
beat a Champion.
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_3000: It was almost like I saw myself in Flygon.
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_3100:
Since then, we’ve gone through many rounds of
intense training.
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_3200:
Flygon and I honed our teamwork in all the
environments we could find in Galar, so I know
we’ll bring the storm here on Pasio, too.
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_3300:
Of course I’ve got tons of stories about Duraludon
and my other Pokémon as well.
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_3400: But their stories are for another day!
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_3500:
That’s enough chin-wag. Flygon’s moves are in
top shape right now, and we’re itching to try them
out in battle.
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_3600: How about it? Wanna help us out?
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_0402_4000:
Always eager for a battle, aren’t you.
That’s what makes it worth asking!
charaepi_ch0257_40_qibana/2301_1201_4100:
Bring the storm! My partner will send everything
on this whole mountain flying!
